return.name: JSON Object
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: recordsDeleted
property.type: count of number of records deleted</li

section.title: Scope
section.description: The required scope for this method is
CURL for Bash command window or Mac/Linux terminal:

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "/DeleteFormInstance/value_of_formInstanceId" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
